backQuote: try missing a couple of payments.

frontQuote: I finally got around to reading that book
backQuote: on anti-gravity. I can't put it down!

frontQuote: I can't believe I got fired from the calendar factory.
backQuote: All I did was take a day off!

frontQuote: I told my computer I needed a break.
backQuote: Now it won't stop sending me KitKat ads.
I see food, and I eat it.
But now I'm not so sure.
